mapper.select: select id, user_phone, pass_word, registration_time, name, user_sex, user_address,user_status from user_info where user_phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_phone, pass_word, registration_time, name, user_sex, user_address,user_status) values(#{phone},#{passWord},#{registrationTime},#{name},#{sex},#{address},#{status});
